# Cleansing Fire

> Decentralized technology to shift power from corrupt concentrated authority toward the people. A philosophy of Pyrrhic Lucidity: see clearly, act anyway, bear the cost. Agent-first, human-accessible. The human interface is Claude Code CLI.
